document_data.name: House Jae'llat
document_data.mainbody: '''House Jae'llat''' was a [[drow]] house located in [[Ust Natha]].
document_data.Organization: House Jae'llat was the founding house of Ust Natha, and the powerful [[lich]] [[Deirex Jae'llat]] was part of their ranks. Their home was located above the male fighter's society of Ust Natha. Their residence was filled with [[gem]]s and could only be entered with a ward stone. It was also heavily guarded by drow [[fighter]]s with [[long sword]]s and [[shield]]s.
document_data.History: The matron mother of House Jae'llat once outwitted [[Jarlaxle]] and humiliated him, a rare happening. Jarlaxle may have employed [[Gorion's Ward]] to steal gems from the founder, Deirex, and may have killed him.
document_data.Members:
* [[Deirex Jae'llat]]: founder of Uth Natha and a powerful lich.
* [[Rilloa Jae'llat]]: a [[cleric]] trained in using a flail.
* [[Hindra Jae'llat]]: a cleric who kept a [[diamond]] on her person.
* [[Ist'tar Jae'llat]]: a fighter trained in using a long sword.
